job description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:

Kforce has a client seeking a Systems and Data Analyst 4 in Englewood, CO.

Responsibilities:
  • Support tasks within an Agile backlog focused on building out Digital Ascent Data Management capabilities, including data modeling, requirements gathering, API designs, identifying security, privacy and governance requirements for data content
  • Participate in design and construction of data catalogs, working with a variety of third party tools
  • Work closely with development teams building ETL (extract/transform/load) capabilities as well as defining approaches to extract content from a variety of legacy and cloud-based application databases
  • Experience with large scale software development projects, specifically focused on the full life cycle data issues involved is required
  • Extensive experience with a variety of database and ETL technologies is required
REQUIREMENTS:
  • 5 years' experience with Large-Scale Agile Software Development experience - 5+ years
  • 5+ years' experience with Database design, setup, operation, problem solving - various Databases ok
  • 3+ years' experience with Data Modeling as part of development process, based on requirements
  • 3+ years' experience with legacy system migration to cloud deployment (Azure preferred); beneficial, not required
Kforce is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.
